phrases: Let us work together, like way back when.
We are all waiting for you.
We can do it, the five of us together!
I will be waiting for you.
Nonoka, did something happen with Shione?
I thought we were friends again yesterday.
She said she would work on it with us.
Is Togawa holding onto something again?
She wants to be with us, but she is too embarrassed.
I said, Do you like Nonoka or not?
I am impressed you asked that.
So do not be discouraged, Nonoka.
Huh, are not you with Nonoka and the others?
Noel, there is something I want to ask you.
Once I grant your wish, I get called over to another wish.
Just like when you all called me.
Your wish is going to be granted soon.
I am going to see the planetarium, too!
But is the saucer going to be okay?
So I am going to see the planetarium, too.
Everyone is going to smile now.
I am hoping to go to the Hokubi Festival on Sunday.
We have three days to do something about it.
She is was all, We will not make it in time.
You are here for the rice cakes, are not you?
It is true that we need the help.
We need more than four people to make it.
Looks like we can get it done on time now, huh?
How are you supposed to know what to do if I do not give orders?
We do not need your orders to do our work.
Who do you think you are?
Nonoka, I am sure Shione is...
She gave a Hokubi Festival ticket to Noel, just like everyone else.
Let us make this a success!
No, it is not like that.
There is nothing you need to worry about, Dad.
But I want to get there as soon as I can.
I know I said I wanted to stay.
Yeah, once we are all here, it will be like the old days.
We will celebrate with Koharu's rice cakes!
I was just thinking, your hobby's turning out to be useful.
I will need about this many.
How to Call a Flying Saucer (UFO)
You are going to believe me?
I bet we are not the only ones.
What are you two talking about so secretly?
I want to ask you to do something.
That would be awesome, if one actually came.
We might end up on TV.
For Koharu, Yuzuki and Souta to smile.
There is one more thing we need to do.
we have to think about something we want.
The saucer is supposed to be attracted to our strong feelings that way.
So we have to make a wish?
Does that mean the saucer will grant it for us?
I do not know about that.
Okay, but what if we have a lot?
It might not come true if I told someone.
I promised to meet her here.
The Melody We Want to Share with You
Nonoka, can you show Noel-chan around?
Leave all this stuff to us.
I will call you as soon as we find Shione.
I will go around school with this.
Let us have something to eat.
Would you like to try it?
Oh, it is a red bean bun.
It is sweet, but it is all so warm and tasty.
She might be at the planetarium.
Let us go meet up with Yuzuki and the others when we are done eating.
I am sure she is coming.
I just heard from the teacher.
I am going to Shione's place!
Do you know where she lives?
Do you want to see the planetarium while we are waiting for Nonoka?
I want to see it with everyone.
We will all be here soon.
I am leaving for a bit.
Seriously, it is because you are carrying that thing around.
You should text her Togawa's address.
I will look for her a little more.
I thought I told you not to come near me.
Why are not you coming to the Hokubi Festival?
I said I do not want to be with you guys.
Are you not coming because you cannot forgive me?
Maybe you cannot forgive me after I made you wait seven years.
I told you, I do not want to hear what you have to say.
You gave her the ticket because you wanted to see it with her,
I want us all to see the planetarium together.
I want us to have fun together like before.
Stop using my given name like we are friends.
I do not want to call you Togawa-san.
We are friends, are not we?
I do not want to see your face.
We are not friends or anything.
I do not make promises I cannot keep,
and I do not say things to get people's hopes up.
I wonder if Nonoka found Shione.
Jeez, there is no point to this if the five of us are not all here.
I am here to help clean up.
Sorry, we will do it ourselves.
Sorry to make you come here.
I have not given up yet.
She was there a minute ago.
